flounder.sounds

Class SoundEmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.sounds.SoundEmitter

  • public class SoundEmitter
extends java.lang.Object
    An emitter of sound effects in the 3D world. The volume of sounds emitted from a SoundEmitter depends on how close the IAudioListener is to the emitter in the 3D world.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SoundEmitter(Vector3f position)
      Creates a 3D sound emitter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector3f getPosition() 
      float getVolume() 
      boolean isInUse()
      Checks if this emitter is currently playing any sounds.
      boolean isPlayingSound(SoundEffect sound)
      Checks if a certain sound effect is being played by this emitter.
      void playSound(SoundEffect soundEffect)
      Plays a sound effect from the position of this emitter in the world.
      void setPosition(float x, float y, float z)
      Sets the position of the emitter in the 3D world.
      void setVolume(float volume)
      Sets the volume of this emitter.
      void silence()
      Stops any sound effects that are currently being played from this emitter.
      void update(float delta)
      Updates all the sound effects that are currently being played by this emitter, and removes and sound effects that are no longer playing or are out of range of the IAudioListener.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SoundEmitter

        public SoundEmitter(Vector3f position)
        Creates a 3D sound emitter.
        Parameters:
        position - The 3D location the sound is comming from.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Updates all the sound effects that are currently being played by this emitter, and removes and sound effects that are no longer playing or are out of range of the IAudioListener.
        Parameters:
        delta - The time in seconds since the last frame.

      • getPosition

        public Vector3f getPosition()
        Returns:
        The position of the emitter in the 3D world.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(float x,
                        float y,
                        float z)
        Sets the position of the emitter in the 3D world.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position.
        y - The y position.
        z - The z position.

      • getVolume

        public float getVolume()
        Returns:
        The volume of the sound emitter.

      • setVolume

        public void setVolume(float volume)
        Sets the volume of this emitter.
        Parameters:
        volume - The new volume.

      • isInUse

        public boolean isInUse()
        Checks if this emitter is currently playing any sounds.
        Returns:
        true if any sounds are currently being played by this emitter.

      • playSound

        public void playSound(SoundEffect soundEffect)
        Plays a sound effect from the position of this emitter in the world. It does this by sending a PlayRequest to the DeviceSound.
        Parameters:
        soundEffect - The sound effect to be played from this emitter.

      • isPlayingSound

        public boolean isPlayingSound(SoundEffect sound)
        Checks if a certain sound effect is being played by this emitter.
        Parameters:
        sound - The sound effect in question.
        Returns:
        true if the sound effect in question is being played by this emitter.

      • silence

        public void silence()
        Stops any sound effects that are currently being played from this emitter.
